verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah<s%>, when he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> these <S%H1697>words<s%> in a <S%H5612>book<s%> at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, unto <S%H1263>thee<s%>, O Baruch:

Thou didst <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H188>Woe<s%> is me <S%H3068>now<s%>! for Jehovah hath <S%H3254>added<s%> <S%H3015>sorrow<s%> to my <S%H4341>pain<s%>; I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> with my <S%H585>groaning<s%>, and I <S%H4672>find<s%> no <S%H4496>rest<s%>.

Thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H559>him<s%>, Thus saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1129>Behold<s%>, that which I have built will I break <S%H2040>down<s%>, and that which I have <S%H5193>planted<s%> I will pluck <S%H5428>up<s%>; and this in the whole <S%H776>land<s%>.

And <S%H1245>seekest<s%> thou great <S%H1419>things<s%> for <S%H1245>thyself<s%>? seek them <S%H935>not<s%>; for, behold, I will bring <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; but thy <S%H5315>life<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto thee for a <S%H7998>prey<s%> in all <S%H4725>places<s%> whither thou <S%H3212>goest<s%>.
